login.title: ARTESTERISM
login.adminDescription: Please sign in with your Google account
login.firstLoginNote: You'll set up your art preferences on first login

home.title: Museum List
home.description: Find museums that match your preferences

preference.title: Preference Settings
preference.description: Tell us your favorite art styles
preference.profileDescription: Please provide some basic information to help us recommend the best art for you

1.name: Tokyo Museum of Contemporary Art
1.description: A museum showcasing the latest trends in contemporary art. Enjoy diverse genres of artworks.

2.name: Kyoto National Museum
2.description: Features traditional Japanese art and crafts. Experience the culture of the ancient capital.

3.name: Yokohama Museum of Art
3.description: Exhibits a wide range of modern art from Japan and abroad. Rich special exhibitions.

4.name: Osaka City Museum of Fine Arts
4.description: Houses a wide collection from classical Japanese art to contemporary art.

5.name: Fukuoka Asian Art Museum
5.description: A museum specializing in contemporary Asian art. Provides multicultural perspectives.

6.name: National Museum of Western Art
6.description: Exhibits Western art from Renaissance to modern times. Features world-class collections.

7.name: Akakura Museum
7.description: A museum pursuing the fusion of innovative contemporary art and traditional works.

8.name: Chiba Prefectural Museum
8.description: A regional museum showcasing local art and rotating special exhibitions.

9.name: National Museum of Western Art
9.description: Exhibits Western art from Renaissance to modern times. Features world-class collections.

10.name: Ohara Museum of Art
10.description: Known for its distinguished collection of Western modern art and Japanese works.

11.name: Pola Museum of Art
11.description: A museum with a notable collection of Impressionist and modern art set in Hakone's natural surroundings.

12.name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
12.description: One of the world's largest and finest art museums, with collections spanning ancient to contemporary art.
